类 ElectricVehicle

  • java.lang.Object
    • ElectricVehicle
  • public class ElectricVehicle
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents an Electric Vehicle (EV) that tracks battery characteristics and calculates range based on environmental factors.

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      构造器 说明

      Sets a new State of Charge (SoC) for the vehicle

                       double batterySize,
                       double stateOfCharge,

    • 方法详细资料

      • range

        public double range()
        Calculates the current driving range of the vehicle. * @return The estimated range computed as: current efficiency * state of charge * battery size.

      • updateEfficiency

        public void updateEfficiency​(double currentTemp)
        Updates the vehicle's efficiency based on the outside temperature. Efficiency remains 100% between 65F and 77F, drops to 85% above 77F, and decreases by 1% per degree below 65F (capped at 50% reduction). * @param currentTemp The current temperature in Fahrenheit.

      • getName

        public java.lang.String getName()

      • getBatterySize

        public double getBatterySize()

      • getStateOfCharge

        public double getStateOfCharge()

      • getEfficiency

        public double getEfficiency()

      • setStateOfCharge

        public void setStateOfCharge​(double stateOfCharge)
        Sets a new State of Charge (SoC) for the vehicle. * @param stateOfCharge The new SoC as a decimal. Clamped between 0.15 and 1.0.

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Returns a string representation of the EV including name, SoC percentage, and range. Format: "Name SOC: 00.0% Range (miles): 00.0" * @return A formatted string describing the vehicle state.
        覆盖:
        toString 在类中 java.lang.Object
